cast.overview: The story of J. Robert Oppenheimer's role in the development of the atomic bomb during World War II.
cast.title: Oppenheimer

cast.overview: Mulder and Scully, now taken off the FBI's X Files cases, must find a way to fight the shadowy elements of the government to find out the truth about a conspiracy that might mean the alien colonization of Earth.
cast.title: The X-Files

details.biography:
Theodore William King (born October 1, 1965) is an American actor, previously credited as T.W. King, best known for his roles as Jack Finnegan on The Bold and the Beautiful, Tomas Delgado on One Life to Live, Lorenzo / Luis Alcazar on General Hospital, Downey on Prison Break, Inspector Andy Trudeau on the first season of Charmed, Officer Jack Logan on the series Timecop, and Danny Roberts on both soap operas Loving and The City.

He has guest starred on a number of TV shows including NCIS: LA, NCIS, Hawaii Five-O, Alpha House, Elementary, CSI: Miami, The Division, Frasier, Law & Order: SVU, Sex & The City, and JAG.
details.name: Ted King
